thread.title: Beijing rolls out red carpet for film festival

title: Beijing rolls out red carpet for film festival
text:
Beijing rolls out red carpet for film festival 2:19pm BST - 01:38 
Beijing film festival kicks off in China's capital, drawing in domestic and international stars. Rough cut (no reporter narration). ▲ Hide Transcript ▶ View Transcript
